definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: He saw an Egyptian beating a Hebrew, one of his kinsmen.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一个埃及人打希伯来人，他的同族。

sentences.english: Are they Hebrews? So am I. Are they Israelites?
Some Hebrews even crossed the Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 有些希伯来人过了约旦河，逃到迦得和基列地。

sentences.english: And Saul blew the trumpet throughout all the land, saying, Let the Hebrews hear!
sentences.chinese: 扫罗在遍地吹角，意思说，要使希伯来人听见。

sentences.english: And some of the Hebrews went over Jordan to the land of Gad and Gilead.
sentences.chinese: 有些希伯来人渡过了约旦河，逃到迦得和基列地。

sentences.english: The story of the three Hebrew children being cast into the fiery furnace is a familiar one.
sentences.chinese: 三个希伯来人被掷入火窑的故事，是一个很好的例子。

definition: the Pentateuch/the five books of Moses in the Old Testament
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Phoenicia, ancient civilization along the coast of the Mediterranean Sea

pinyin: Mei3 suo3 bu4 da2 mi3 ya4
